name: Löwenzahn: Geschichten aus Natur, Umwelt und Technik
summary: An educational game based on the German TV show 'Löwenzahn'. The game teaches kids about nature, economy and technical aspects on the world.

name: Löwenzahn 2: Geschichten aus Natur, Umwelt und Technik
summary: The second installment of the educational game series based on the German TV show 'Löwenzahn'. The game teaches kids about nature, economy and technical aspects of the world.
